notesStmt.note: The book Wayu huihua keben was issued by Yunnan Minzu Daxue in mimeographed handwritten form sometime before 1996. It is not currently in print. It contains 60 lessons introducing the Wa language, with each lesson consisting of a dialogue in Wa, using standard PRC orthography; an interlinear Chinese translation of the dialogue; and a Wa vocabulary list, with Chinese definitions.

Modifications, usually variations from mechanical equivalents in actual RB diction and usage, appear in the text as deletions in a struck-out red font and additions in a green, fixed-width font. Glosses and various explanatory notes within the text appear differently, depending on whether the text is being displayed in the multiple-column style of the Versioning Machine or in the single-column interlinear style. In the former style, glosses are indicated by a small "G" icon next to the text. Clicking on the icon will open the note in a separate window. In the latter style, an ID number appears within the text and the note itself appears at the very bottom of the document, with an ID which, while not identical, is close!

app.lem: [Ko beng dui loux loux Vāx?]
app.rdg: [Khaw:peung: tui:lox lox Vāx]
佤语会话课本 (Wǎyǔ huìhuà kèběn)
A Textbook of Wa Dialogues

app.lem: KO TĪX
app.rdg: KHAW: TIX
第一课
Lesson 1

app.lem: A: Mōh mox?
app.rdg: A: Mawh mawx?
甲: 谁？
A: Who is it?
က။ ဘယ္သူလဲ။

app.lem: B: Mōh ex.
app.rdg: B: Mawh eux auxThere is a direct one-to-one correspondence of Wa-CN ex and Wa-MM aux..
乙: 是我。
B: It's me.

app.lem: A: Noh mōh mox?
app.rdg: A: Nawh mawh mawx?
甲: 他是谁？
A: Who is he?
က။ သူကဘယ္‌သူလဲ။

app.lem: B: Noh mōh Jao Ai Bāo.
app.rdg: B: Nawh mawh Cao: Ai: Pao.
乙: 他是赵岩保。
B: He's Jao Ai Bao (a.k.a. Zhao Aibao, Zhao Yanbao).

app.lem: A: Beix houig din yūh ba dix?
app.rdg: A: Pex hoek tin: yuh pa tix patix?
甲: 你们来这里做什么？
A: What have you come here for?
က။ ခင္‌ဗာတုိ ဘာလုပ္‌ဖုိဒီကုိ လာသလဲ။

app.lem: B: Yix houig dix sōg vāi lāi gah maix.
app.rdg: B: Yix hoek tix sawg vai lai kah kaKa is used in majority of Wa-MM texts, although STB 2005 Bible uses kah. maix.
乙: 我们来向你借书。
B: We've come to borrow a book from you.

app.lem: A: Sang vāi beix lāi dix gah ex?
app.rdg: A: Sang: vai pex lai tix ka aux?
甲: 你们要借什么书？
A: What book do you want to borrow?
က။ ဘာစာအုပ္‌ ငားခင္‌သလဲ။

app.lem: B: Yix sang vāi pug lāi cix ding lāi Vax.
app.rdg: B: Yix sang: vai phuk lai tshix ting: lai Vax.
乙: 我们想借本佤文字典。
B: We want to borrow a Wa language dictionary.
ခ။ “ဝ”စာအဘိဓာန္‌စာအုပ္‌ကုိ ငားခင္‌ပတယ္‌။

app.lem: KO RA
app.rdg: KHAW: RA:
第二课
Lesson 2

app.lem: A: Mōh giex mox?
app.rdg: A: Mawh kiex mawx?
甲: 她俩是谁？
A: Who are those two?
က။ သူတုိစ္ေယာက္ ဘယ္သူလဲ။

app.lem: B: Mōh mīex ex mai būx nbun ex.
app.rdg: B: Mawh miex aux mai: pux bun: aux.
乙: 是我的妈妈和妹妹。
B: They're my mother and my younger sister.
ခ။ သူတုိက အေမနဲ ညီမပ။

app.lem: A: Yūh giex dix?
app.rdg: A: Yuh kiex tix?
甲: 她俩在做什么？
A: What are they doing?
က။ သူတုိ ဘာလုပ္ေနကသလဲ။

app.lem: B: Daeh giex hngoux.
app.rdg: B: Tauh kiex nghox.
乙: 她俩在舂谷子。
B: They are pounding rice [to remove the husks].
ခ။ ေမာင္းေထာင္းေနကပတယ္။

app.lem: A: Hngoux dix?
app.rdg: A: Nghox tix?
甲: 什么谷子？
A: What kind of rice?
က။ ဘာဆန္ မိးလဲ။

app.lem: B: Hngoux bīd.
app.rdg: B: Nghox pid.
乙: 糯谷。
B: Glutinous (sticky) rice.

app.lem: A: Ax hu ma kaing.
app.rdg: A: Ax hu: ma: khaing:.
甲: 我俩下地去吧。
A: Let's (us two) go to the (dry) fields.

app.lem: B: Ex sang hu ndaex gaeng.
app.rdg: B: Aux sang: hu: daux kaung:.
乙: 我要去田里。
B: I want to go to the rice paddy.
ခ။ ကန္ေတာ္ေတာ့ လယ္သားခင္တယ္။

app.lem: A: Maix hu ex gah hu nang.
app.rdg: A: Maix hu: aux kah hu: nang:.
甲: 你去，我也去。
A: If you go, I'll go too.
က။ ခင္ဗာသားရင္ ကန္ေတာ္လည္းလုိက္သားမယ္။

app.lem: B: Hmom, ax hu dāe.
app.rdg: B: Mhawm:, ax hu: tau.
乙: 好，我俩一起去。
B: Good, we'll go together.
ခ။ ေကာင္းပပီ။ အတူတူသားရေအာင။္

app.lem: KO LOUI
app.rdg: KHAW: LOE:
第三课
Lesson 3

app.lem: A: Mōh si mēix in mox?
app.rdg: A: Mawh simex in: mawx?
甲: 这个男人是谁？
A: Who is this man?
က။ ဒီအမိးသား ဘယ္သူလဲ။

app.lem: B: Noh mōh bāox gei si mēix ex.
app.rdg: B: Nawh mawh paox ke: simex aux.
乙: 他是我的哥哥。
B: He is my older brother.
ခ။ သူက ကန္ေတာ့္ အကုိပ။

app.lem: A: Nbun an mōh būi mox?
app.rdg: A: Bun: an: mawh pui mawx?
甲: 那个女的是谁？
A: Who is that woman?
က။ အဲဒီအမိးသမီး ဘယ္သူလဲ။

app.lem: B: Noh mōh bāox gei nbun ex.
app.rdg: B: Nawh mawh paox ke: bun: aux.
乙: 她是我的姐姐。
B: She is my older sister.
ခ။ သူက ကန္ေတာ့္ အမပ။

app.lem: A: Giex houig din yūh dix?
app.rdg: A: Kiex hoek tin: yuh tix?
甲: 他俩来这里做什么？
A: What did the two of them come here for?

app.lem: B: Houig dix sōg būx ex.
app.rdg: B: Hoek tix sawg pux aux.
乙: 来找我的弟弟。
B: They came to see my younger brother.
ခ။ ညီေလး အလည္လာကတာပ။

app.lem: A: Hoig houig būx maix?
app.rdg: A: HoikPre-2000 Wa-MM often used hoit, but now hoik is standard. hoek pux maix?
甲: 你的弟弟来过没有？
A: Has your younger brother arrived?

app.lem: B: Hoig, dāeg hu nux.
app.rdg: B: Hoik, taug hu: nux.
乙: 来过，刚才走。
B: Yes, he just left.
ခ။ ဟုတ္ကဲ့၊ ခုနပဲသားပတယ္။

app.lem: A: Giex sōg būx maix yūh dix gah?
app.rdg: A: Kiex sawg pux maix yuh tix kah?
甲: 他俩找你弟弟做什么？
A: What are they looking for your younger brother for?
က။ ညီေလး ဘာလုပ္ဖုိ ရာေနကသလဲ။

app.lem: B: Hag noh hu tong rīang dāe.
app.rdg: B: Hak nawh hu: thawng: riang tau.
乙: 约他一起去照相。
B: To invite him to go have their picture taken together.

app.lem: A: Tong ndēe mox?
app.rdg: A: Thawng: dee mawx?
甲: 哪里照？
A: Where will they have it taken?
က။ ဘယ္မာုိက္ကမလဲ။

app.lem: B: Tong ndaex laih.
app.rdg: B: Thawng: daux laih.
乙: 街上照。
B: They'll have it taken in town.

app.lem: KO BOUN
app.rdg: KHAW: PON:
第四课
Lesson 4

app.lem: A: Gaex maix dix?
app.rdg: A: Kaux maix tix?
甲: 你叫什么名字？
A: What's your name?
က။ နာမည္ ဘယ္လုိေခသလဲ။

app.lem: B: Gaex ex Siao Ai Hang.
app.rdg: B: Kaux aux Shiao: Ai: Hang:.
乙: 我叫肖岩汉。
B: My name is Siao Ai Hang (a.k.a. Xiao Aihan, Xiao Yanhan).
ခ။ စိေယာင္အုိက္ဟန္လုိ ေခပတယ္။

app.lem: A: Oud nyīex beix ndēe mox?
app.rdg: A: Ot nyiex UWSA LVPLG-GK texts usually use nyiiex, STB-NT 2002 used nyiex, STB 2005 returned to nyiiex. pex dee mawx?
甲: 你家在哪里？
A: Where is your home?
က။ ဘယ္မာ ေနသလဲ။

app.lem: B: Nyīex yix oud Yaong Soi.
app.rdg: B: Nyiex yix ot Yaong: Soi:.
乙: 我家在岩帅。
B: Our home is in Yaong Soi (Aishuai, Yanshuai).

app.lem: A: Nyīex beix goui būi mīex gaex?
app.rdg: A: Nyiex pex koe: pui miex kaux?
甲: 你们家有几个人？
A: How many people are there in your family?
က။ မိသားစုမာ ဘယ္စ္ေယာက္ ရိသလဲ။

app.lem: B: Goui boun gaex, mōh geeing ex, mīex ex, būx ex mai ex.
app.rdg: B: Koe: pon: kaux, mawh keeing: aux, miex aux, pux aux mai: aux.
乙: 有四个人，父亲、母亲、弟弟和我。
B: There are four people: my father, my mother, my younger brother, and me.

app.lem: A: Mīex geeing maix yūh gāing dix?
app.rdg: A: Miex keeing: maix yuh kaing tix?
甲: 你父母做什么工作？
A: What work do your mother and father do?
က။ အေဖအေမ ဘာ အလုပ္လုပ္ လုပ္ကသလဲ။

app.lem: B: Geeing ex mōh jao pad qe, mīex ex mōh jao bai saex.
app.rdg: B: Keeing: aux mawh cao: phat cheu:, miex aux mawh cao: pai: saux.
乙: 我父亲是驾驶员，母亲是医生。
B: My father is a truck driver and my mother is a doctor.
ခ။ အေဖက ေလာ္ရီကားသမား၊ အေမေတာ့ ဆရာဝန္မပ။

app.lem: KO PUAN
app.rdg: KHAW: PHUAN:
第五课
Lesson 5

app.lem: A: Goui maix mīex nūm?
app.rdg: A: Koe: maix miex num?
甲: 你有几岁？
A: How old are you?
က။ အသက္ဘယ္ေလာက္လဲ။

app.lem: B: Goui ex dīx nga nūm puan.
app.rdg: B: Koe: aux tix nga: num phwan: tinga: phwan: num.
乙: 我有二十五岁。
B: I'm 25 years old.

app.lem: A: Yūh maix gāing ndēe mox?
app.rdg: A: Yuh maix kaing dee mawx?
甲: 你在哪里工作？
A: Where do you work?
က။ ဘယ္မာအလုပ္လုပ္သလဲ။

app.lem: B: Mgāe ex lāi sioux siao.
app.rdg: B: Gau aux lai siox shiao:.
乙: 我在学校教书。
B: I teach school.
ခ။ ေကာင္းဆရာ လုပ္ပတယ္။

app.lem: A: Mgāe maix lāi Hox, mgāe maix lāi Vax?
app.rdg: A: Gau maix lai Hawx, gau maix lai Vax?
甲: 你教汉文，还是教佤文？
A: Do you teach the Chinese language or the Wa language?
က။ တုပ္စာသင္သလာစး၊ “ဝ”စာသင္သလား။

app.lem: B: Lāi Hox, lāi Vax dōu mgāe.
app.rdg: B: Lai Hawx, lai Vax to gau.
乙: 汉文、佤文都教。
B: I teach both Chinese and Wa.
ခ။ တုပ္စာနဲ“ဝ”စာ စ္ခုစလုံး သင္ပတယ္။

app.lem: A: Gī gāing yūh maix laih?
app.rdg: A: Ki kaing yuh maix laih:?
甲: 你工作忙吗？
A: Does your work keep you busy?
က။ အလုပ္မားသလား။

app.lem: B: Gon mōh kom, ang od gī hlaox.
app.rdg: B: Kawn: mawh khawm:, ang: awt ki lhaox.
乙: 还可以，不太忙.
B: It's OK, I'm not too busy.
ခ။ ရပတယ္။ အလုပ္ သိပ္မမားပဘူး။

app.lem: A: Nyōm mgāe lāi goui mīex ndīng?
app.rdg: A: Nyawm gau lai koe: miex ding?
甲: 有多少学生？
A: How many students do you have?

app.lem: B: Goui ha sib ha gaex.
app.rdg: B: Koe: ha: sip ha: tiphwan: phwan: kaux.
乙: 有五十五个。
B: I have fifty-five (55).
ခ။ ငးဆယ့္ငးေယာက္ ရိပတယ္။
